                                           AnnotatedEntity persisted)

Convenience method to compare two TestEntity objects based on their fields via reflection. This method will fail if returned types are complex types due to the equals comparison.

assertDetachedFieldException

public static void assertDetachedFieldException(java.lang.Object obj,
